name: Best Friends (itch) (Snowiisu)
description:
A prototype of my Final Year Project. 

Play as Riley who is going to a friend's birthday party.

Credits:-

  • Fungus Plugin (https://fungusgames.com/)
  • Paper Texture by PkGam (https://www.deviantart.com/pkgam/art/Crumpled-Paper-Texture-429242491)

Music by Purple Planet (https://www.purple-planet.com/)

  • Possession (Title screen music) - (https://www.purple-planet.com/tracks/possession)
  • Up Your Street (1st scene music) - (https://www.purple-planet.com/tracks/up-your-street)
  • Paranoia (2nd scene music) - (https://www.purple-planet.com/tracks/paranoia)
  • Enterprise (2nd scene music) - (https://www.purple-planet.com/tracks/enterprise)
  • Sweet Success (3rd scene music) - (https://www.purple-planet.com/tracks/sweet-success)

Sound Effects From SoundBible (https://soundbible.com/)

  • Wind (2nd scene sound) - (https://soundbible.com/1810-Wind.html)
  • Phone Vibration (2nd scene sound) - (https://soundbible.com/1994-Phone-Vibrating.html)
  • Candy Bar Wrapper (3rd scene sound) - (https://soundbible.com/95-Candy-Bar-Wrapper.html)

Fonts

  • Hey Comic by Khurasan (used as the main font) - (https://www.dafont.com/hey-comic.font)
  • Blueberry Days by Khurasan - (https://www.dafont.com/blueberry-days.font)
